ud7.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud7.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena savatthiya manussa yebhuyyena kamesu satta (…) ratta giddha gathita mucchita ajjhosanna andhikata sammattakajata kamesu viharanti.
ud7.4:2.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
ud7.4:2.2: Addasa kho bhagava savatthiya te manusse yebhuyyena kamesu satte ratte giddhe gathite mucchite ajjhopanne andhikate sammattakajate kamesu viharante.
ud7.4:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
